europeana:record.dc:title: A revision of the genus Arcania Leach, 1817 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Leucosioidea)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Galil B.S.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
Decapoda
Leucosioidea
Arcania
Ixoides
new species
Indo-Pacific
europeana:record.dc:description: A study of major collections led to a revision of the Indo-Pacific leucosioid genus Arcania Leach, 1817. Ixoides cornutus MacGilchrist, 1905 is recognized as belonging to the genus, and four new species are established: A. echinata, A. foliolata, A. muricata and A. fungilifera; in all, fifteen Arcania species are recognized. All species are described and illustrated, extended synonymies are given, and a key for their identification is provided.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A revision of the genus Arcania Leach, 1817 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Leucosioidea) (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 75, 1-15)
